Uses of Package
org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.v3

  • Packages that use org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.v3 
    Package Description
    org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.v3
    Provides the "version 3" scan framework (which can also be thought of as EVF version 2).
    org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.v3.file  
    org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.v3.lifecycle
    Implements the details of the scan lifecycle for a set of readers, primarily the process of resolving the scan output schema from a variety of input schemas, then running each reader, each of which will produce some number of batches.
  • Classes in org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.v3 used by org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.v3 
    Class and Description
    BaseMockBatchReader
    Base class for the "mock" readers used in this test.
    BaseScanTest
    Test of the scan operator framework.
    BaseScanTest.BaseScanFixtureBuilder 
    BaseScanTest.ReaderCreator
    Fixture that creates the reader and gives a test access to the reader.
    FixedReceiver
    Layer above the ResultSetLoader which handles standard conversions for scalar columns where the schema is known up front (i.e.
    FixedReceiver.Builder 
    ManagedReader
    Extended version of a record reader which uses a size-aware batch mutator.
    ManagedReader.EarlyEofException
    Exception thrown from the constructor if the data source is empty and can produce no data or schema.
    ReaderFactory
    Creates a batch reader on demand.
    ScanFixture
    Holds the scan operator and its context to simplify tests.
    ScanFixture.ScanFixtureBuilder
    Wraps a scan lifecycle builder to build the scan fixture.
    ScanLifecycleBuilder
    Gathers options for the ScanLifecycle then builds a scan lifecycle instance.
    ScanLifecycleBuilder.SchemaValidator 
    SchemaNegotiator
    Negotiates the table schema with the scanner framework and provides context information for the reader.
